title: Manner of computing front open space/setback where the street is to be widened-If the building plot abuts any road which is proposed to be widened under the Development Plan or because of the prescription of regular lines of streets under the Mumbai Municipal Corporation Act, 1888, the front open space /road-side set back shall be measured from the resulting road widening line
clause_text: Manner of computing front open space/setback where the street is to be widened-If the building plot abuts any road which is proposed to be widened under the Development Plan or because of the prescription of regular lines of streets under the Mumbai Municipal Corporation Act, 1888, the front open space /road-side set back shall be measured from the resulting road widening line.
section: Open Spaces within Building Plots/ Layout
